main_definition: Numbers refer to quantities, numerical values or mathematical concepts related to counting and measurement.

meanings_and_examples.example: When I said there are 24 hours in a day, I was referring to numbers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Numerical digits or symbols representing quantities and values
meanings_and_examples.example: The price of the product is $19.99.
Adding numbers 5 and 7 gives us a sum of 12.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group or set of numbers arranged in order according to certain rules
meanings_and_examples.example: The natural numbers start from 1 and go up (1, 2, 3, ...).

meanings_and_examples.definition: Numbers used as a code for identifying items or individuals
meanings_and_examples.example: Customer service will reach out to you using the number provided.
